湣字的基本解释

湣
mǐn
古同“闵”，古代谥号用字。

湣
hūn
昏乱：湣湣之浊世。

湣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǐn］
［《集韻》美隕切，上準，明。］
(1)同“閔”。古代谥号用字。
(2)通“慜”。病。
[②]［hūn］
同“涽1”。
昏乱。参见“湣2湣”、“滑2涽”。
[③]［miàn］
［《集韻》眠見切，去霰，明。］
暗淡无光。

湣字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　湣； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页637第25
【集韻】美隕切【正韻】弭盡切，?音閔。諡也。與閔通。春秋宋閔公，魯閔公。史記宋魯世家作湣公。　又【集韻】眉貧切，音珉。義同。　又眠見切，音麪。元湣，混合也。或作惽。亦省作泯。【司馬相如·大人賦】紅杳眇以元湣。【註】言光彩相耀。幽藹炫亂也。　又呼昆切，音昏。滑湣，未定之謂。【莊子·齊物論】置其滑湣，以隸相尊。湣，徐邈音昬。

湣字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

湣字的起名意思

古代谥号用字。同“闵”。

["Jiyun" is beautifully cut, accurate and clear. ]

[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　湣; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 637 No. 25
[Ji Yun] Meiyu Cut [Zheng Yun] Cut it all,? Yin Min. Posthumous posthumous. With Min Tong. Spring and Autumn Song Min Gong, Lu Min Gong. Historical Records Song Lu's family as the father of Zhao.　[Jiyun] The eyebrows are poor and cut, and the sound is min. The same meaning.　Mian and see cut, sound surface. Yuan Zhao, mixed also. Or beacon. Also save for dew. 【Sima Xiangru·Adults' Fu】Hong Yaoxie is based on Yuan Mao. [Note] The words are brilliant and brilliant. You Ain Hyun also chaos.　Called Kunqi again, the sound was dim. Slippery, undecided. [Zhuangzi·Qiwu Lun] Put it in a slippery way, and respect it with the official.湣, Xu Miao Yinzhan.
